verses.verse: Blessed <WH835> is every one that fears <WH3373> the Lord <WH3068>; that walks <WH1980> in his ways <WH1870>.
For you shall eat <WH398> the labor <WH3018> of your hands <WH3709>: happy <WH835> shall you be <WH2896>, and it shall be well with you.

Your wife <WH802> shall be as a fruitful <WH6509> vine <WH1612> by the sides <WH3411> of your house <WH1004>: your sons <WH1121> like olive <WH2132> plants <WH8363> round about <WH5439> your table <WH7979>.
Behold <WH1397>, that thus shall the man be blessed <WH1288> that fears <WH3373> the Lord <WH3068>.
The Lord <WH3068> shall bless <WH1288> you out of Zion <WH6726>: and you shall see <WH7200> the good <WH2898> of Jerusalem <WH3389> all the days <WH3117> of your life <WH2416>.
Yes <WH7200>, you shall see your children <WH1121>'s sons <WH1121>, and peace <WH7965> upon Israel <WH3478>.
